What is there to say about this game? Its the best Multiplayer shooter of all time in my opinion. I've been thinking about reviewing this game for years but I never knew what to say. And that's the thing its such a unique game you just have to experience it for yourself. From the characters, to the jokes, to the maps, to the game play, and the timeless art style, TF2 is a real gem.  When you run into a match with bots it can be a bit annoying, but even with the on-going bot problem, when you can find a good match its still an amazing experience. I will never forget the times I've had, the memories I've made, the communities I've joined and the people I've met in this game. I have had a blast with this game, I have framed posters about it around my house, and I hope to continue enjoying this game for years to come.

Team Fortress 2 is probably one of the best games on steam so far. I could play this game for hours, and I do. In my opinion, you should get the orange box. It is a really good game bundle and has THE BEST GAME ON STEAM. Half life 2.

Though this game is going through a very very horrible issue with bots and cheaters filling every sever, the game is still relatively fun to play, and the community is usually a great thing to be a part of. A large majority of players in the tf2 community are kind and welcoming, and, yes, there are a few people that are not so welcoming, but they are rare and can be ignored. Its truly amazing, since tf2 servers can go from being infested with bots, to a normal tf2 server, and then to a relatively friendly server. Team Fortress 2 is truly a game that feels as though it never gets old.
It's a good game, real good. Maybe even the best
To kill TF2, you need to destroy all existing servers and then it will die, but I'm not sure about that.
Excelente juego , divertido e innovador para su epoca .
